channel.title: Pricing & Contracts on SmartWeb Support
channel.description: Recent content in Pricing & Contracts on SmartWeb Support

item.title: SmartWeb AI Customer Support Pricing
item.description:
Cost Structure link

SmartWeb AI Customer Support pricing consists of initial costs and monthly fees.

Specific amounts will be provided in detail during our proposal after we understand your requirements.

Services Included in Initial Costs link

The initial cost includes the following work required to start the service.

Consultation & Proposal link

Content Description
Consultation We conduct detailed interviews about current challenges and requirements (web conference)
Proposal We propose the optimal plan based on the consultation content
Quote We create quotes for optional work or customization when needed

Initial Setup Work link

Content Description
LiveAgent Setup Initial configuration of ticket system, email integration, chat functions, etc.
FlowHunt Setup Initial configuration of AI chatbot, knowledge base integration, etc.
Operation Testing Testing after setup completion and necessary adjustments

Implementation Support link

Content Description
Operation Training Lecture on system operation methods and utilization points (web conference)
Setup Guide Explanation of items that customers need to configure themselves
Correction Support Implementation of necessary adjustments after testing

Services Included in Monthly Fees link

Monthly fees include continuous service usage and operational support.

item.title: About 'My Account' and Contract Modification
item.description:
My Account Overview link

“My Account” is a management interface that consolidates contract-related information for LiveAgent.

Logging into My Account link

https://liveagent.jp/liveagent/user/account_login.php

â€»Due to specification changes, the “My Account” icon that was previously displayed at the bottom left of the agent panel is now hidden. Going forward, please use the login page above to access your account.

item.title: Can you issue a quote before payment?
item.description:
Basic Policy on Quote Issuance link

SmartWeb does not, in principle, accommodate advance quote issuance. However, we strive to provide flexible responses tailored to our customers’ business needs.

For detailed information about estimates or specific service content, we recommend contacting us directly.

Supplementary Information Regarding Estimates link

SmartWeb’s services have the following characteristics according to customer needs:

  • Real-time fee confirmation available
  • Instant price information provision online
  • Flexible pricing plan configuration

Specific pricing and detailed specifications may vary depending on service characteristics and the latest available content.

item.title: How do I make payments?
item.description:
Payment Overview link

We will explain the initial fees and costs at the start of your subscription.

Initial Fees link

At the time of contract, we will charge initial fees and 3 months’ worth of estimated monthly fees.

Costs During Implementation Period link

Implementation work will begin after payment confirmation. Please note that costs will accrue from the start of service, including the implementation preparation period.

Payment Methods link

From the 4th month after implementation, you can choose from the following payment methods:

item.title: Is there a free trial available?
item.description:
Free Trial Availability link

Trial Implementation Status link

SmartWeb does not currently offer a free trial in order to provide customers with optimal customized settings. This is a decision made to responsibly deliver high-quality services to our customers.

Service Features and Alternative Approaches link

Instead of a free trial, we have prepared the following comprehensive support system:

  • Demonstration: Our specialized staff will carefully explain the detailed features of our products
  • Customization Consultation: We conduct consulting tailored to your specific needs
  • Support Center: We have established a specialized team to quickly respond to pre-implementation questions

How We Meet Customer Needs link

SmartWeb aims to meet customer expectations not through trials, but through detailed support and flexible implementation plans. Specifically:

item.title: What are the costs for migrating from other services?
item.description:
Data Migration Costs link

Using the Free Migration Plugin link

The free migration plugin provided by SmartWeb Support enables simple and cost-effective data migration from other services. The main features of this plugin are as follows:

  • Supports data migration from major platforms such as WordPress, Shopify, Wix, and others
  • Automatically transfers website content, product information, customer data, and more
  • Easy to use even for those without technical knowledge

Since there are basically no additional costs incurred during data migration, user burden is minimized.
